name: Manneke Budiman
text: A very interesting unusual place for sight-seeing yet I found it highly educating and worth visiting. A cocoa and coffee plantation and processing site established in 1911 during the Dutch colonial era. Now an international cocoa and coffee research institute that sells a wide variety of coffee and chocolate products on site.
